website_summaries.verdict: Great for concealing blemishes while also helping to clear them up faster.
pros: Oil-free formulation that also contains salicylic acid to help clear up blemishes while concealing them
Provides good coverage and lasts all day
cons: Not ideal for dry skin due to the salicylic acid

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Been using this one for a few years now and I love it. It’s my favorite drugstore concealer. It really does treat your breakouts while you’re wearing it and a little goes a long way. TIP: When loading the wand with the product for application, swirl the wand in the tube like you would with mascara, don’t pump. It’ll cause the concealer to dry out too quickly. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Avril Lucie

customer_reviews.title: My product was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Product came in traditional packaging, but was less expensive than what I usually pay for it in the store. The shade is fine, and the makeup itself is fine, but the tube/container does not scrape the applicator when you pull it out, so the entire applicator stick is coated in a quarter of an inch of makeup. Makes it very hard to use and to cleanly get the applicator back into the tube. I’m wondering if this is the reason it was so cheap; maybe it was a close out?
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: fabulous concealer
customer_reviews.text: this product is perfect you only have to apply just a little bit of it and it works. Any spot there was was cleared up in a day and you could not tell it was on.. great product not harsh on you r skin I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana E Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, high quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works very well. I was looking for an inexpensive, quality concealer, and I found it. It pretty much erased my under eye circles, which are very dark. As I wore it throughout the day, it grew cakey. I think that’s because I didn’t use any powder or setting spray on it, and because I probably put just a touch too much on my face. Don’t let the price fool you—this product is high quality. I only wish they had more shades.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: It really does help acne as it decreases breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve been using it for at least 5 years, & it’s the only product that covers acne marks while helping to reduce acne as well. It blends well & I do see a reduction in breakouts. I highly recommend its use! I should add that I have sensitive skin, & everything else usually causes an increase of breakouts instead of helping them.
customer_reviews.author: DaniDawnW

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this concealer since high school and I am now 26. Works like a charm and doesn't make me breakout even more when I am trying to conceal a blemish. The tube does oxidize over time as the product gets older so while it is "safe" for I think 18 months after opening? I change mine out every 4 months ish so I don't have that oxidizing problem. Would recommend. I have oily skin
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: BIG MESS!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and it works great. I don't know if I got a reject this time or if they have changed the tube when they revamped their look. I absolutely hate the packaging. You can't pull the wand out and put it back in without taking out half the makeup with it. It's really gross! The product itself is still great...but I can't continue to buy it if most of it is going to be wasted every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Not for under eyes, unless you want to dry out that sensitive area
customer_reviews.text: This formula is very thick, and I wouldn't recommend using it to conceal the under eye area. This dried out my skin almost instantly and left me with crepey skin. It's probably fine for concealing blemishes, but even my very effective eye cream was no match for this incredibly dehydrating concealer.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was weary at first I don’t wear much make up. This does help cover the redness and I do feel like it helps them go away! I felt a tingle when I put it on acne to cover .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this concealer for acne spots. I had previously tried the neutrogena acne concealer and it was no where near as good as this one. First of all this one matches my skin tone so much better. I wear fair or porcelain foundation and got this in the light color and it blends in beautifully. It is also a thicker creamy texture that I enjoy. It helps shrink the size of my pimples but it doesn't over dry my skin. I can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Bates724

customer_reviews.title: New formula stinks like fish
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recall ever writing a review for anything in my life. Ever. I’ve used this concealer for greater than 15 years. Something has changed. It reeks like fish! Not an exaggeration. I thought maybe it was a bad batch from Amazon so I bought one from a department store. And that one stinks as well. If this is how they’re weening us from this product to discontinue. They win. Moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Black

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It really does work great! Its more of a creamy consistency which I prefer. The color matched well to my skin. When I've used this to cover up acne I've noticed a reduction in the amount of time it takes for the blemish to heal. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramphasto

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and blend in compared to a cover stick. I ordered light/medium and it's a good shade. I've been using fair and it was too light. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.P

customer_reviews.title: Very dark color for normal skin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 13-year old daughter to cover occasional blemishes. The color of this concealer (light/medium) is much too dark for her skin and shows up more than the blemish itself. Not impressed for the money.
customer_reviews.author: HipShopper

customer_reviews.title: Oxidizes
customer_reviews.text: The light/medium had a pink/mauve tone when it dried. I also bought the medium and that was an orange/peach when it dried. Not happy. The pictures don't show the colors well after it dried. But believe me, it dries a different shade.
customer_reviews.author: Rizpah

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: I received this quickly. I have had a hard time finding the right shade for my skin. I tested it last night it blended very well and covered my redness I have developed after pregnancies and that is exactly what I wanted. I have sensitive skin and it hasnt bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good, maybe just a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this product considering all of the positive reviews. It was much too thick, almost like it had dried out somehow; it’s just not usable in it’s current clumpy state. The color was lighter than I expected as well, though this may be me th King I’m paler than I am.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Undereye concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is great for under the eyes only. This doesn't work well for covering acne on oily skin. You do need to set this with a powder if you have a greasy face like mine. This doesn't cause breakouts or clog my pores which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Very skimpy amount of product inside the container.
customer_reviews.text: There was hardly anything in this tube. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Really prevents an allergy problem.
customer_reviews.text: Get a darker shade then you normally would. I'm ivory skinned, so I bought the lightest. Had to go back to buy a darker shade and use the other bottle as a concealer. I went one shade darker but I could have gone two. No allergy problems. Oops. This belongs under foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works well and "clears" as it conceals.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and "clears" as it conceals. I apply about 2 times a day (if/when needed).
customer_reviews.author: Royal Review

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer for Combo Skin & Acne!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin (quite oily but also dry), so I need makeup that is the perfect texture for me. This concealer is it! It stays all day and blends really easily. I also see my acne decrease MORE when I'm wearing this concealer vs. when I'm bare faced. Will always love this concealer, I hope it never changes!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness/consistency for covering up blemishes and under eye circles. The shade is perfect for Asian skintone. I like how it has some acne treatment ingredient too
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I do like this for blemishes, but it’s not great as an under eye concealer. It clumps and smudges, plus there aren’t many shades and the lightest one still isn’t light enough to really lighten up the under eye, bridge of the nose, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: i was excited to try this, (im always looking for new concealers) however its kinda dry , it doesnt seem like it will last very long, also under eye coverage is not the best. its more of a spot concealer to put on each blemish.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased before, so this was simply a restock. This stuff works great, easy cover and treat. I will even use at night in leu of another acne treatment. Super easy to apply and blend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excelente product!! It totally helps, does it’s job! Recommend!!! My teenage daughter uses it and work miracles!! We are totally in to this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Maridaglen Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent. Helps with acne.
customer_reviews.text: Does not break out my sensitive skin. Decent coverage on mild scarring and dark patches. Does not feel thick when foundation is applied after product. Good color. Not my favorite but is pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R. Powell-McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Good, helps acne, but oxidizes
customer_reviews.text: If I have a really bad open pimple, I will apply this over it and the pimple will flatten throughout the day, but it does oxidize quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: It covers and dries up the acne!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pimple concealer I have had! I bought a second one as soon as I tried it! Great coverage and acne treatment in one!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for blemishes
customer_reviews.text: My go to for covering up acne spots. I like that is has salicylic acid in it to help with fighting acne, while covering blemishes. I have one in my purse & make up bag. My teen daughter is always asking to borrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My brother has super sensitive skin and breaks out with almost any concealer but this one he has no issues with.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my tween, whom is now experiencing the wonderful world of puberty! Hello zits! Just a few dabs on the zits, light blending and she's good. The color is a decent match-will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Boston

customer_reviews.title: Works Well To Cover Light Acne
customer_reviews.text: Great for covering the "Mask Related" acne on my chin. It blends well & seems to be clearing it up .
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Markow

customer_reviews.title: Great for blemishes NOT for under eyes
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! Just keep in kind to NOT use under your eyes. Its not for that
customer_reviews.author: Jason Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination oily skin
customer_reviews.text: You really can’t beat this concealer for the price. I have combination oily skin and I can get away with wearing this without primer or foundation - in Florida summer heat. I’ve never had issues with creasing or breakouts like with some other products.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Been using tis brand for along time. Great everyday coverup. Just wish it came in a better bottle.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good cover up
customer_reviews.text: Works well to cover up acne. Thick and lasts all day. Color matched well with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this concealer for over 20 years! Even though I’m now in my late 40’s, it is still perfect to cover blemishes: it doesn’t come off as quickly as those marketed for skin in my age group. Since I don’t use it to cover my entire face, it never dries my skin out. My top favorite concealer of all time!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Does exactly what I need it to do. Shade is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It felt light on my skin and provided really good coverage. I think the container is a bit small for the money but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Briar Sage

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Does not cover blemishes the best and not the easiest to blend. Buttttt you get what you pay for sooooko
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my daughter's and my go-to concealer for our acne-prone skin for years!!
customer_reviews.author: Radgear

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky
customer_reviews.text: The product isn't easy to blend. It creases if not mixed with some moisturizing creme.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: Matches my skin tone great, dabs into the skin smoothly and easily, effectively conceals redness, and gets rid of the pimples! I love this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Polacco

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this stuff forever!
customer_reviews.text: I get blemishes from time to time, but this definitely covers them up well AND it gets rid of them within the day most of the time. I've been using this product since I was a teen, and it's still useful whenever I have an occasional breakout. Also, I have sensitive skin, and this is actually very nice on my skin. It doesn't itch or cause irritation when I put it on, so that's a big plus in my book
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Totally works, been using for years
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is the only product of its kind I get anymore that DOESNT make clogged pores or ache worse. It actually heals it, it dries it out, heals it and there is less scarring with this stuff. I highly recommend ;)
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite concealer. I couldn’t find it in ANY drugstores at all, so I went to amazon as a last resort and there it was. Super affordable, and it’s exactly the same as my other tube I bought a couple years ago
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for break-outs
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this concealer for years now. I have sensitive break-out prone skin and this stuff works wondering to help with that without irritating my skin. I've tried other products but nothing has compared.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Almay & Forever
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for many many years; I don't anticipate stopping anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharebear

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using it for years to help cover and clear up pimples. You can also use it with a makeup sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Been using it for years. Clears up blemishes without drying skin and stays put all day. Just wish they made more shades.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Kristal

customer_reviews.title: Should have sent it back
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this product at all; it isn't what I expected or wanted and should have taken the time to send it back. The color is not right for me. It covers BUT needs to be blended in quite a bit and even after blending still seems to show where used. Don't use it and passing it on to someone else who might want it or I will just throw it away. too much trouble to send back.
customer_reviews.author: FV&DL

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I am visually impaired. This works great. Easy to use. Covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: My wife found that these product was not easy to apply and would not stay on throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Malkah

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. especially that i have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job at covering up blemishes
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job at covering up blemishes. Difficult to find my perfect shade but after I put on my powder, and blend it out, I can barely tell that I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Matches my skin tone perfectly. I don’t even bother with foundation that much anymore. I just put a little under my eyes and on any red spots or bright red pimples and it blends in with my skin perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shading and blended well. Very good value for my money
customer_reviews.author: mscarnecchia

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, helps heal if covering blemishes. Prefer slightly different Almay concealer for sensitive under-eye skin.
customer_reviews.author: StylishTechno

customer_reviews.title: Giant mess!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was way overfilled, it’s an enormous mess. Could only use once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Regsandbacon

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This actually covers blemishes!!!! It’s thick and hasn’t made me break out. Couldn’t be happier with this concealer. I’ll never use another one.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: It is too thick. It goes on and is kind of clumpy. I’ve never had this problem when buying from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Utecht

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to hide tiny amounts of acne but it is drying. I am prone to acne at the ripe age of 40 and I use it around my hair line, chest and back. On the face, it is too drying.
customer_reviews.author: MattLisa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic concealer. I have mixed skin
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic concealer. I have mixed skin, leaning towards dry, and this doesn't make the flaking worse. It blends easily, and I can wear it alone for spot treatment and under powder foundation. Absolutely love it, and it does seem to make a break out heal a little faster.
customer_reviews.author: silver

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The color is way too light especially when you are trying to cover blemishes. Oh and it didn’t help clear them up so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marble

customer_reviews.title: Old, Thick and Gloppy.
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to be great but the tube that I received was definitely old and expired. The concealer was so thick and gloppy that it barely attached to the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Lychee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy to blend. Good for young and older skin
customer_reviews.author: hugo paredes

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just a small dab and skin imperfections are covered. Easy to use. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Penn

customer_reviews.title: Ok-ish
customer_reviews.text: When I applied this under my eyes it feels a bit dry but the coverage is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Changes color
customer_reviews.text: Like what the other reviews say, it changes color over time.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Slightly cakey, but still a good concealer for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Decent coverage and doesn’t break me out. Docked a star because it’s slightly cakey and shows your wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer I have found. It's the only kind I can use that doesn't cause breakouts. In fact, it helps clear up a blemish.
customer_reviews.author: sisterfriend56

customer_reviews.title: works great to cover flaws
customer_reviews.text: i've used this product for years & i'm totally happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: This is a very very good product for very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very good product for very sensitive skin. I was very skeptical about it afraid that it would clog my pores but low and behold it didn't . It covered my irritated red acne. It won't clog my pores or dry out my skin and its unscented which is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: moonwolfspirit

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: The only concealer I’ll use. Good color and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light coverup. I use it all the time under my foundation to help with the redness in my cheeks
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Peterson

customer_reviews.title: High quality concealer for sensitive, acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this concealer for years. It definitely does what it says it will do. Always pleased with Almay products.
customer_reviews.author: Maj

customer_reviews.title: Yep great for his or her face a must for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 for my car and 1 for the bathroom :) my Boyfriend even started using this for his blemishes and it blends great you can’t even notice! Plus it fixes the blemishes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic acne and so far this is the only makeup that has effectively worked in covering my acne as well as not making me break out more (in fact it's seemingly helping!). I have even accidentally slept in it by mistake without repercussions. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for years and it seems to help clear up acne quicker while concealing it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for redness! Excellent shipping packaging, product came new and sealed as well, will def buy again from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Strange Fish

customer_reviews.title: The cover looks pretty natural and it doesn't dry out the area
customer_reviews.text: Works well, covers my pimples greatly and last all day without having to reapply. The cover looks pretty natural and it doesn't dry out the area. Very easy to apply with the wand then I blend it with my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: joyan

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome works really well lasts all day for me (I have dry skin) I have noticed that sometimes it doesn't blend very well though, but just use a damp beauty blender and it'll perfect. Also take your take time blending isn't a fast process.
customer_reviews.author: Tay K

customer_reviews.title: Best acne/redness concealer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rate: Best acne/redness concealer I have used lasts all day. If u don't wear makeup and only used this for spot treatment is not visibly noticable at all! 5 stars. Directions advice: Use applicator to apply then use a cotton swab to blend and ur done!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBadger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for blemishes as a "Heal and Conceal". Works well under powder mineral foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Aquamarine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing for blemishes and not oily so it doesn’t make me break out more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes this one a lot
customer_reviews.text: We didn't know what color to get and this one was a touch darker than we thought, but it looks good and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: William K Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I even use this as my only coverage instead of foundation. It works that well, very blendable with different skin tones. Definitely helps with acne prone skin
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic concealer for price covers up my blemishes and I love the stick
customer_reviews.author: Brie livesey

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. It is a nice formula and provides full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Dingus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Only thing is I find that it is a little tricky to get all the the product out!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: terrible! it did not match my shade at all and was all dried up after a day. DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin & I tend to break out a lot. But not with this concealer.... it keeps my skin clear & covers up imperfections nicely. Great color... feels great on the skin... not oily. Love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Came empty
customer_reviews.text: It came almost empty, it does not dissolve well, looks like bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this concealer. I have very sensitive skin and this works well with my blemishes without irritation.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have spent from $10 to $35 for concealer this is by far the best one. Great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. It covers well but doesn't last long. I reapply halfway though the day
customer_reviews.author: ShannonH

customer_reviews.title: Great for Oily & Blemish Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to most makeup which clogs pores and leads to breakouts on oily/acne prone skin. I like this cover-up because it looks natural and has a drying/healing effect on blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sefcik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my skin color and does a great job covering blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Almay Clear Complexion Concealer, Matte Finish with Salicylic Acid and Aloe, Oil Free, Hypoallergenic, Cruelty Free, Fragrance Free, Dermatologist Tested, 100 Light, 0.18 oz
product_meta.description: Color:LightWhy just cover a blemish when you can also help clear it up and prevent future outbreaks with salicylic acid? Our anti-blemish concealer is formulated with opaque pigments, aloe, chamomile and the maximum-strength dose of derm-favorite salicylic acid. The creamy, comfortable matte finish concealer blends seamlessly, so you won't be able to detect the blemish—or the concealer disguising it. As always, our clean concealer is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic, fragrance free, and cruelty free. Available in 6 shades: Light, Light Medium, Medium, Medium Deep, Deep, and Dark
feature_bullets: Formulated with opaque pigments and the maximum-strength dose of derm-favorite salicylic acid—so it doesn't just disguise existing blemishes, it helps prevent new acne breakouts
Blends so seamlessly, you won't be able to detect the blemish—or the concealer disguising it
Creamy formula with aloe and chamomile
As always, our clean concealer is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic, fragrance free, and cruelty free
